RawLine: SDM_3101047052,{color=#cc0000}相{/color}思互守新燭前，{color=#cc0000}緣{/color}雖無形比金堅；{color=#cc0000}親{/color}結媒妁情不減，{color=#cc0000}恩{/color}同再造心相連。,{color=#cc0000}相{/color}思互守新烛前，{color=#cc0000}缘{/color}虽无形比金坚；{color=#cc0000}亲{/color}结媒妁情不减，{color=#cc0000}恩{/color}同再造心相连。

Items.r: {color=#cc0000}相{/color}思互守新燭前，{color=#cc0000}緣{/color}雖無形比金堅；{color=#cc0000}親{/color}結媒妁情不減，{color=#cc0000}恩{/color}同再造心相連。
Items.c: 相思互守新燭前,緣雖無形比金堅；親結媒妁情不減,恩同再造心相連。
Items.mt: The love of each other before the new candle, though invisible, is stronger than gold; the affection of the matchmaker is not diminished, and the kindness of the heart is the same.

Items.r: {color=#cc0000}相{/color}思互守新烛前，{color=#cc0000}缘{/color}虽无形比金坚；{color=#cc0000}亲{/color}结媒妁情不减，{color=#cc0000}恩{/color}同再造心相连。
